title: Event Step Configuration
description: Event-driven step that subscribes to multiple user activity events and tracks behavioral patterns for email automation triggers.

title: User Activity Tracking
description: Creates and stores user activity records with comprehensive metadata for behavioral analysis and engagement scoring.

title: Behavior Profile Management
description: Creates and updates user behavior profiles with engagement scores, activity counts, and behavioral triggers.

title: Engagement Score Calculation
description: Calculates engagement scores based on user activities with weighted scoring for different activity types and engagement levels.

title: Behavioral Trigger Detection
description: Detects behavioral triggers like cart abandonment, inactivity, high engagement, and purchase readiness for automated email campaigns.

title: User Segment Change Detection
description: Detects when users change engagement segments and emits events for dynamic segmentation and targeted campaigns.
